name: Bot: Back on track
description:
Bot : Back on track is a platform puzzle game.

Plot : In this game the character is a robot which have been destroyed by humans when arrived on earth. All his parts are split and you have to help him to gather them together.

Controls :

  • Left & Right arrows : Move
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • R key : Restart level

Team :

  •  Original Concept : Vincent Breheret
  •  Level Design : Duncan Larané, Julien Linder & Quentin Gillet
  •  Programming : Florian Oster & Duncan Larané
  •  Concept Artists : Vincent Breheret & Emma Suire
  •  Background Artist : Emma Suire
  •  Props Artist : Coline Marchal
  •  Original Music & Sound Design : Masami Komuro
